TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSACryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.RSA implements class System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
Public NotInheritable Class RSACryptoServiceProvider Inherits RSA Implements ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm
public ref class RSACryptoServiceProvider sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RSA, System::Security::Cryptography::ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 使用加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 提供的 算法的实现执行非对称加密和解密。

span.span: Performs asymmetric encryption and decryption using the implementation of the algorithm provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是默认实现。This is the default implementation of . 增量为 8 位支持 384 位至 16384 位的密钥大小，如果你有了 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安装。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果已安装了 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider，它会在增量为 8 位支持 384 位至 512 位的密钥大小。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效密钥大小是依赖于由加密服务提供程序 (CSP)实例。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. Windows Csp 启用密钥大小为以前的 Windows 版本的 384 到 16384 位[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，和密钥大小为 512 到 16384 位[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。Windows CSPs enable keys sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文档中的函数。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation. ## 与 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的互操作Interoperation with the Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI) 与非托管 CAPI 中的 RSA 实现不同类加密的字节数组的顺序反转之后加密, 和解密之前。Unlike the RSA implementation in unmanaged CAPI, the class reverses the order of an encrypted array of bytes after encryption and before decryption. 默认情况下，数据加密通过类不能解密由 CAPI`CryptDecrypt`函数和数据加密由 CAPI`CryptEncrypt`方法无法解密类。By default, data encrypted by the class cannot be decrypted by the CAPI `CryptDecrypt` function and data encrypted by the CAPI `CryptEncrypt` method cannot be decrypted by the class. 如果你无法执行补偿的反向排序时 Api 之间进行互操作类将引发。If you do not compensate for the reverse ordering when interoperating between APIs, the class throws a . 与进行互操作 CAPI，必须手动撤消加密的字节的顺序之前加密的数据与另一个 API 互操作。To interoperate with CAPI, you must manually reverse the order of encrypted bytes before the encrypted data interoperates with another API. 你可以轻松地反转托管的字节数组的顺序，通过调用方法。You can easily reverse the order of a managed byte array by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类转换为字节数组加密字符串，然后将这些字节解密回字符串。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例将导出的密钥信息创建使用到对象。The following code example exports the key information created using the into an object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.ExportParameters/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不找到任何默认密钥，则创建新密钥。If no default key is found, a new key is created. 此构造函数创建密钥对，用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换。This constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于生成使用的密钥`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类转换为字节数组加密字符串，然后将这些字节解密回字符串。The following code example uses the class to encrypt a string into an array of bytes and then decrypt the bytes back into a string. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不找到任何默认密钥，则创建新密钥。If no default key is found, a new key is created. 此构造函数创建密钥对，用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换。This constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于生成使用的密钥`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，将生成新密钥，并将它存储在密钥容器。The following code example creates a , generates a new key, and stores it in a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-2/VB/example.vb#1)]

Public Sub New (parameters As CspParameters)
public: RSACryptoServiceProvider(System::Security::Cryptography::CspParameters ^ parameters);

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要传递给加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 的参数。

span.span: The parameters to be passed to the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

summary.span: 使用指定的参数初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建或重新使用使用指定的密钥容器字段`parameters`参数。This constructor creates or reuses a key container specified using the field of the `parameters` parameter. 默认情况下，此构造函数创建密钥对，用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换。By default, this constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于生成使用的密钥`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 你可以创建密钥对适用于进行身份验证 （进行数字签名） 的消息或文件设置字段`parameters`参数值。You can create a key pair suitable for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files by setting the field of the `parameters` parameter to the value. 这种类型的键对应于`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。This type of key corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 如果你创建对象值指定，然后创建另一个对象指定值，这两个键将放置在单个容器中，如果这两个对象指定相同的密钥容器名称.If you create an object with the value specified and then create another object with the value specified, both keys will be placed in a single container if both objects specify the same key container name. 若要创建一个密钥，强名称签名使用与兼容类，你必须创建密钥对。To create a key that is compatible with stong-name signing using the class, you must create a key pair. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，将生成新密钥，并将其存储在密钥容器。The following code example creates an object, generates a new key, and stores it in a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-csp/VB/example.vb#1)]

span.span: The CSP cannot be acquired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建或重新使用使用指定的密钥容器字段`parameters`参数。This constructor creates or reuses a key container specified using the field of the `parameters` parameter. 默认情况下，此构造函数创建密钥对，用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换。By default, this constructor creates an key pair suitable to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 生成的密钥对应于生成使用的密钥`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。The generated key corresponds to a key generated using the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 你可以创建密钥对适用于进行身份验证 （进行数字签名） 的消息或文件设置字段`parameters`参数值。You can create a key pair suitable for authenticating (digitally signed) messages or files by setting the field of the `parameters` parameter to the value. 这种类型的键对应于`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。This type of key corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 如果你创建对象值指定，然后创建另一个对象指定值，这两个键将放置在单个容器中，如果这两个对象指定相同的密钥容器名称.If you create an object with the value specified and then create another object with the value specified, both keys will be placed in a single container if both objects specify the same key container name. 若要创建一个密钥，强名称签名使用与兼容类，你必须创建密钥对。To create a key that is compatible with stong-name signing using the class, you must create a key pair. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，将生成新密钥，并将它存储在密钥容器。The following code example creates a , generates a new key, and stores it in a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.ctor-int32-csp/VB/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取描述有关加密密钥对的附加信息的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

value.span: 描述有关加密密钥对的附加信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来检索加密的密钥对的附加信息。Use the property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair. 返回对象描述密钥是否可导出，并指定密钥容器名称、 有关提供程序，信息和其他信息。The returned object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information. 直到你调用的方法，将使用的密钥，不将在其中生成一个随机密钥的情况下，创建的密钥容器。In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key. 某些属性返回对象属性将引发如果尚未创建的密钥容器。Some properties of the object returned by the property will throw a if a key container has not been created. 若要确保已创建的密钥容器，调用方法如， ， ， ，依此类推，在调用之前属性。To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as , , , , and so on, before you call the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to call the property. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RsaCryptoServiceProvider.CspKeyContainerInfo/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 对以前加密的数据进行解密。

span.span: Decrypts data that was previously encrypted.

span.span: The data to be decrypted.

param.name: fOAEP
param.span: 如果为 ，则使用 OAEP 填充（仅可用于运行 Microsoft Windows XP 及更高版本的计算机）执行直接 解密；否则，如果为 则使用 PKCS#1 v1.5 填充。

span.span: to perform direct decryption using OAEP padding (only available on a computer running Microsoft Windows XP or later); otherwise, to use PKCS#1 v1.5 padding.

summary.span: 使用 算法加密数据。

span.span: Decrypts data with the algorithm.

returns.span: 已解密的数据，它是加密前的原始纯文本。

span.span: The decrypted data, which is the original plain text before encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用用此方法进行解密的数据进行加密。Use to encrypt data for decryption with this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行加密和解密数据。The following code example encrypts and decrypts data. 此示例使用类; 但是，类可能在大型数据操作中更好。This example uses the class; however, the class may be preferable in large data operations. 加密的值可另存为`nvarchar`Microsoft SQL Server 2005 中的数据类型。The encrypted value can be saved as an `nvarchar` data type in Microsoft SQL Server 2005. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.Decrypt/VB/example.vb#1)]

The encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了支持的不同版本的 Microsoft Windows 和的最大长度的填充`rgb`允许的操作系统和填充的不同组合。The following table describes the padding supported by different versions of Microsoft Windows and the maximum length of `rgb` allowed by the different combinations of operating systems and padding. |填充Padding|支持的操作系统Operating System Supported|Rgb 参数的最大长度Maximum Length of rgb Parameter| |-------------|--------------------------------|-------------------------------------| |OAEP 填充 (PKCS #1 v2)OAEP padding (PKCS#1 v2)|Windows XP 或更高版本。Windows XP or later.|取模大小-2-2 \* hLen，hLen 所在的哈希值的大小。Modulus size -2 -2\*hLen, where hLen is the size of the hash.| |直接加密 (PKCS #1 v1.5)Direct Encryption (PKCS#1 v1.5)|Microsoft Windows 2000 或更高版本且安装了高加密包。Microsoft Windows 2000 or later with the high encryption pack installed.|取模大小-11。Modulus size - 11. （11 个字节是填充可能的最小。）(11 bytes is the minimum padding possible.)| |指示不支持的加密和 OAEP 填充Direct Encryption and OAEP padding not supported|Microsoft Windows 98、 Windows Millennium Edition 或 Windows 2000 或更高版本，而无需安装了高加密包。Microsoft Windows 98, Windows Millennium Edition, or Windows 2000 or later without the high encryption pack installed.|对于对称密钥允许的最大大小。The maximum size allowed for a symmetric key.| 使用来解密此方法的结果。Use to decrypt the results of this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例初始化对象到的值 （由另一方发送） 的一个公钥，生成会话密钥 using算法，然后使用对加密会话密钥使用对象。The following code example initializes an object to the value of a public key (sent by another party), generates a session key using the algorithm, and then encrypts the session key using the object. 使用此方案，会话密钥无法发送回的 RSA 私钥的所有者和两个参与方无法使用会话密钥交换加密的数据。Using this scheme, the session key could be sent back to the owner of the private RSA key and the two parties could use the session key to exchange encrypted data. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider.Encrypt/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 的这一实现中可用的密钥交换算法的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm available with this implementation of .

value.span: 如果存在密钥交换算法，则为密钥交换算法的名称；否则为 。

span.span: The name of the key exchange algorithm if it exists; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示的算法，而不是类型的名称。This property indicates the name of the algorithm, not of the type. 例如，RSA PKCS1 KeyEx 是密钥交换算法名称。For example, RSA-PKCS1-KeyEx is a key exchange algorithm name.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; }
.property instance int32 KeySize
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前密钥的大小。

span.span: Gets the size of the current key.

value.span: 密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size of the key in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增量为 8 位支持 384 位至 16384 位的密钥大小，如果你有了 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安装。The supports key sizes from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 如果已安装了 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider，它会在增量为 8 位支持 384 位至 512 位的密钥大小。It supports key sizes from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed. 有效密钥大小是依赖于由加密服务提供程序 (CSP)实例。Valid key sizes are dependent on the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that is used by the instance. 为以前的 Windows 版本的 384 到 16384 位的 Windows Csp 启用密钥大小[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]，和密钥大小为 512 到 16384 位[!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]。Windows CSPs enable key sizes of 384 to 16384 bits for Windows versions prior to [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)], and key sizes of 512 to 16384 bits for [!INCLUDE[win81](~/includes/win81-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) Windows 文档中的函数。For more information, see [CryptGenKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa379941\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function in the Windows documentation. 类不允许你更改使用的密钥大小属性。The class does not allow you to change key sizes using the property. 写入到此属性的任何值将无法更新属性时没有错误。Any value written to this property will fail to update the property without error. 若要更改密钥的大小，使用构造函数重载之一。To change the key size, use one of the constructor overloads.

value.span: 如果应在 CSP 中保留此密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key should be persisted in the CSP; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于将保存在密钥容器的密钥。Use this property to persist a key in a key container. 属性自动设置为`true`时指定密钥容器名称中的字段对象，并使用它来初始化对象通过调用带构造函数之一`parameters`参数。The property is automatically set to `true` when you specify a key container name in the field of a object and use it to initialize an object by calling one of the constructors with a `parameters` parameter. 属性不起作用如果对象创建与`null`密钥容器名称。The property has no effect if the object is created with a `null` key container name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，并将密钥保存到密钥容器。The following code example creates an object and persists the key to a key container. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.PersistKey/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建使用进行验证的数字签名方法。This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the method. `halg`参数可以接受、 ，或。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . 字符串值可以是以下项之一：The string value can be one of the following: - 对象标识符 (OID) 友好名称的要使用的哈希算法，在加密配置文件或一个加密 API OID 表中注册的名称。The object identifier (OID) friendly name of the hash algorithm to use, either a name registered in the crypto config file or one in the Crypto API OID table. - OID 值。The OID value. OID 必须是识别的加密 API 之一。The OID must be one recognized by the Crypto API. 例如，你可以使用 SignData （新字节 [5]，"1.3.14.3.2.26"） 或 SignData （新字节 [5]，"sha1"） 或 SignData （新字节 [5]，"SHA1"）。For example, you could use SignData(new byte[5], "1.3.14.3.2.26") or SignData(new byte[5], "sha1"), or SignData(new byte[5], "SHA1"). ## Examples 下面的代码示例签名和验证数据。The following code example signs and verifies data. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.SignData1/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建使用进行验证的数字签名方法。This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the method. 有效的哈希算法是和。The valid hash algorithms are and . 算法标识符可以通过使用派生自的哈希名称方法。The algorithm identifier can be derived from the hash name by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例对某些数据进行加密、 创建加密的数据的哈希，然后签名与数字签名的哈希。The following code example encrypts some data, creates a hash of the encrypted data, and then signs hash with a digital signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool UseMachineKeyStore { get; set; }
.property bool UseMachineKeyStore
Public Shared Property UseMachineKeyStore As Boolean
public: static property bool UseMachineKeyStore { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在计算机的密钥存储而不是用户配置文件存储中保留密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the computer's key store instead of the user profile store.

value.span: 如果应在计算机密钥存储中保留密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key should be persisted in the computer key store; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`true`等效于传递标志切换为对象。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to passing the flag to a object. 属性应用于当前的应用程序域中中的所有代码，而对象仅适用于显式引用它的类。The property applies to all code in the current application domain, whereas the object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it. 这些设置可模拟或未加载其用户配置文件的帐户下运行时。These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded. 设置影响密钥存储区位置才初始化不带任何参数。Setting affects the key store location only if is initialized with no parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象并设置静态属性，以使用计算机密钥存储而不是用户配置文件的密钥存储。The following code example creates an object and sets the static property to use the machine key store instead of the user profile key store. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey/CPP/example2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey/CS/example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.RSACSP.UseMachineKey/VB/example2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 验证数字签名有效。

span.span: Verifies that a digital signature is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool VerifyData (byte[] buffer, object halg, byte[] signature);
.method public hidebysig instance bool VerifyData(unsigned int8[] buffer, object halg, unsigned int8[] signature) cil managed
Public Function VerifyData (buffer As Byte(), halg As Object, signature As Byte()) As Boolean
public: bool VerifyData(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, System::Object ^ halg, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ signature);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 已签名的数据。

span.span: The data that was signed.

param.name: halg
param.span: 用于创建数据哈希值的哈希算法的名称。

span.span: The name of the hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.

param.name: signature
param.span: 要验证的签名数据。

span.span: The signature data to be verified.

summary.span: 通过使用提供的公钥计算签名中的哈希值，然后将其与提供的数据的哈希值进行比较，从而验证数字签名是否有效。

span.span: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by determining the hash value in the signature using the provided public key and comparing it to the hash value of the provided data.

returns.span: 如果签名有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the signature is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证数字签名由方法。This method verifies the digital signature produced by the method. 通过从它签名时使用，使用的公钥的签名中获取的哈希值验证的签名并将该值与提供的数据的哈希值进行比较。The signature is verified by obtaining the hash value from the signature using the public key it was signed with, and comparing that value to the hash value of the provided data. `halg`参数可以接受、 ，或。The `halg` parameter can accept a , a , or a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来验证签名。The following example shows how to use the method to verify a signature. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider ManualHash Example/VB/class1.vb#2)]

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter is not a valid type.
